import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; function Cart() { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('cart')}

{t('item')}

{t('total')} 0 {t('items')} {t('totalCost')}

0 BYN

{t('order')}
); } export default Cart;
